key_turning_points.title: Funded awards without durable lock on Banker/Landlord trajectories
Open City project-card submission failed on server mismatch
Opponent final public-point conversion after Mars completion

counterfactuals.change: Avoid funding awards unless win projection is durable
Pre-plan fallback VP line when project-card submit fails in endgame
Contest or deny Builder/Planner by midgame before opponent lock

rule_updates: If award lock confidence is not durable, do not fund the award and convert actions into direct VP or denial.
If opponent has two live milestone races by Gen 6, make an explicit contest-or-concede decision immediately.
If a project-card submit fails twice in endgame, stop retrying and execute a known fallback VP action path.

tool_mismatches.expected: Project-card branch accepts nested payload and resolves card play
tool_mismatches.actual: Rejected with invalid SelectProjectCardToPlayResponse when nested shape used cards instead of card plus full payment
tool_mismatches.mitigation: Use strict nested projectCard response with card and full payment object including all spendable keys.

tool_mismatches.expected: Open City plays normally because it appears in waiting_for project card list
tool_mismatches.actual: Rejected with Unknown card name Open City across multiple payload encodings
tool_mismatches.mitigation: Treat as known server mismatch and pivot immediately to legal fallback action while logging the mismatch.
